GrWebDev Newsletter #2

Submitted by Ben Rousch on Wed, 04/20/2011 - 08:51

I apologize for this second installment of the GrWebDev Newsletter being a little bit late. I'm still working it into my weekend projects and it just slipped through.

March 28 Meeting: Javascript Frameworks
The March meeting is coming together nicely and is almost upon us! Join us at Atomic Object as we enjoy presentations on JQuery, Google Web Toolkit, Patterns and Code Organization, and LABjs. The presenters include Roger Roelofs, Andy Keller, Zach Dennis, and Karl Swedberg. For more information, check out the meeting's full description on our Meetup.com site.
Javascript Frameworks Meeting Info: http://www.meetup.com/grwebdev/events/16301443/

CSS3 on April 25: Call for presenters
The April 25 meeting will be about CSS3. We'll probably do our usual introductory meeting format - approximately four talks each 15 to 20 minutes long by various presenters. If you have some experience with CSS3 and would like to be one of the presenters, get a hold of Ross Hunter (ross-hunter@ross-hunter.com), who will be running that meeting.
CSS3 Meeting Info: http://www.meetup.com/grwebdev/events/16299926/

IRC Channel
Fire up your favorite chat client and join us for some real-time chat in our brand spanking new IRC channel. Feel free to ask questions, make suggestions, or just join us for casual conversation. The channel is #grwebdev on the Freenode network.

Our Sponsors
Several of the most awesome local companies are helping to make GrWebDev meetings happen through financial donations and providing meeting space. We'd like to thank them for their support, and you for participating.
Atomic Object: http://atomicobject.com
Bitmanic: http://bitmanic.com/
Mutually Human Software: http://mutuallyhuman.com/
Revel: http://revel.in/

Our Resources
Web Site: http://www.grwebdev.org/
Meetup Group: http://www.meetup.com/grwebdev/
Discussion Group: http://groups.google.com/group/grwebdev
Twitter Account: http://twitter.com/#!/grwebdev
Facebook Page: http://www.facebook.com/pages/GrWebDev-Grand-Rapids-Web-Development-Group/
IRC Channel: #grwebdev on Freenode
Jobs Board: http://grwebdev.org/joblisting

GrWebDev is proud to be part of The Conga Network. For more information, visit http://conga-wm.org .

More information about text formats

Filtered HTML

  • Web page addresses and e-mail addresses turn into links automatically.
  • Allowed HTML tags: <a> <em> <strong> <cite> <blockquote> <code> <ul> <ol> <li> <dl> <dt> <dd>
  • Lines and paragraphs break automatically.

Plain text

  • No HTML tags allowed.
  • Web page addresses and e-mail addresses turn into links automatically.
  • Lines and paragraphs break automatically.
